channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: @TransitThinker 👆🏻👆🏻 @NotSafe4BikesTO, another one for you. This is near Dundas West Station.
item.source:markdown: @TransitThinker 👆🏻👆🏻 @NotSafe4BikesTO, another one for you. This is near Dundas West Station.

item.description: @TwitterBlue https://t.co/MmnqaOlaWr
item.source:markdown: @TwitterBlue https://t.co/MmnqaOlaWr

item.description: @toddsieling There’s a desktop mode, easily accessible, which seems pretty open, i.e. you can install software by downloading it from a browser. I didn’t do any unlocking or rooting to install itch.​io games, for example. I just had to install the Linux desktop client and login.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling There’s a desktop mode, easily accessible, which seems pretty open, i.e. you can install software by downloading it from a browser. I didn’t do any unlocking or rooting to install itch.​io games, for example. I just had to install the Linux desktop client and login.

item.description: @toddsieling 🤔 I just found a less fiddly way to install Epic Games Store games, so maybe I’ll try that again. I installed the https://t.co/QLPPDNTSSB launcher almost right after unboxing, though.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling 🤔 I just found a less fiddly way to install Epic Games Store games, so maybe I’ll try that again. I installed the https://t.co/QLPPDNTSSB launcher almost right after unboxing, though.

item.description: @toddsieling I do. I like it, but I don’t see myself using it for anything other than small games, or soothing exploration games. There’s one game that I’d play a lot on it if it were still on Steam. I could install it if I fiddle a bunch, but would rather not do that.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling I do. I like it, but I don’t see myself using it for anything other than small games, or soothing exploration games. There’s one game that I’d play a lot on it if it were still on Steam. I could install it if I fiddle a bunch, but would rather not do that.

item.description:
I don’t want to alarm you, but I think I’ve settled on a clothing style where I both look good and feel comfortable.

It’ll make my dad so happy to learn that, just like him, I’m going to be well stocked in collared shirts.
item.source:markdown:
I don’t want to alarm you, but I think I’ve settled on a clothing style where I both look good and feel comfortable.
It’ll make my dad so happy to learn that, just like him, I’m going to be well stocked in collared shirts.

item.description: @rtanglao @duolingo I haven’t been able to find it in the app. It appears to be only for Mandarin speakers? https://t.co/aVKastnFL5
item.source:markdown: @rtanglao @duolingo I haven’t been able to find it in the app. It appears to be only for Mandarin speakers? https://t.co/aVKastnFL5

item.description: @kate_manne 👆🏻👆🏻 @BovyMaltz This came across my feed, passing it along.
item.source:markdown: @kate_manne 👆🏻👆🏻 @BovyMaltz This came across my feed, passing it along.

item.description: @anguspratt I have a cleaning service, since I don’t want to clean any of the surfaces in my place, though I only ever have them come in a day before I leave on an trip, so I can come back to a clean apartment. It’s all the other stuff like cooking and laundry that’s dull and time-consuming.
item.source:markdown: @anguspratt I have a cleaning service, since I don’t want to clean any of the surfaces in my place, though I only ever have them come in a day before I leave on an trip, so I can come back to a clean apartment. It’s all the other stuff like cooking and laundry that’s dull and time-consuming.

item.description:
Interesting. https://t.co/IzQ8QJgTon

@duolingo It’s not at all obvious that Duolingo only offers Cantonese for Mandarin-speakers, which, for simplicity’s sake, I am not.
item.source:markdown:
Interesting. https://t.co/IzQ8QJgTon
@duolingo It’s not at all obvious that Duolingo only offers Cantonese for Mandarin-speakers, which, for simplicity’s sake, I am not.

item.description: First attempt at what I lovingly refer to as “Meal C” (after the letter it’s assigned at my favourite cha chaan teng, New Town Bakery in Vancouver), chicken chow mein. I may have slightly undercooked the chicken (not brown enough). The carrots and bok choy were nice additions. https://t.co/8ulhTSpsp0
item.source:markdown: First attempt at what I lovingly refer to as “Meal C” (after the letter it’s assigned at my favourite cha chaan teng, New Town Bakery in Vancouver), chicken chow mein. I may have slightly undercooked the chicken (not brown enough). The carrots and bok choy were nice additions. https://t.co/8ulhTSpsp0

item.description: I can’t believe I live in Toronto. https://t.co/n6cr2Ltfgx

item.description:
I miss the San Francisco–Oakland Bay Bridge and all views of it. https://t.co/auOBDehSs8

I call it by its full name even when I’m not mad at it.
item.source:markdown:
I miss the San Francisco–Oakland Bay Bridge and all views of it. https://t.co/auOBDehSs8
I call it by its full name even when I’m not mad at it.

item.description: “No, really, is this a joke?” https://t.co/VRSJllKcID
item.source:markdown: “No, really, is this a joke?” https://t.co/VRSJllKcID

item.description:
A dude remarked remarked on my DJ Shadow shirt at the grocery store just now. We had a conversation about it.

It’s only ever been dudes. I’d wonder if there were any women DJ Shadow fans if I didn’t know the reason why women don’t remark on what I wear.
item.source:markdown:
A dude remarked remarked on my DJ Shadow shirt at the grocery store just now. We had a conversation about it.
It’s only ever been dudes. I’d wonder if there were any women DJ Shadow fans if I didn’t know the reason why women don’t remark on what I wear.

item.description: @JomboyMedia The Blue Jays feed caught Gary Sánchez saying something to Lourdes Gurriel Jr. afterwards Hmm, maybe in Spanish? I wonder what that was.

item.description: @Sportsnet We’re gonna need a @JomboyMedia breakdown for this one. The away feed caught Gary Sánchez saying something to Lourdes Gurriel Jr. Hmm, maybe in Spanish? I want some expert lip-reading on that, too.
